product_overview: BlockLearn is an interactive learning platform designed to connect mentors and students for skill development through real-time sessions, leveraging blockchain technology for skill verification and rewards.
core_goals: Provide secure and seamless user authentication including OAuth integration.
Enable real-time communication between mentors and students.
Manage learning sessions efficiently with session creation and retrieval capabilities.
Collect and process feedback to ensure quality and continuous improvement.
Integrate blockchain to verify skill completions and reward users with tokens.
key_features: User authentication system supporting JWT tokens and Google OAuth.
Real-time chat functionality for mentor-student interaction during sessions.
Comprehensive session management including creation and retrieval of sessions.
Feedback system allowing users to rate and comment on completed sessions.
Smart contract based blockchain integration for skill verification and token rewards.
user_flow_summary: Users sign up or log in using email/password or Google OAuth.
Mentors and students browse and match for sessions, then create and join sessions.
During sessions, users communicate in real-time via chat.
After sessions, students submit feedback with ratings and comments.
Skills completed in sessions are verified on blockchain and users receive token rewards.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows should securely issue and validate JWT tokens and handle Google OAuth correctly.
Chat messages must be delivered in real-time without loss or delay.
Session API must allow authenticated users to create and fetch sessions accurately.
Feedback submissions should be stored and retrievable with correct association to sessions.
Blockchain skill verification should correctly confirm skill completion and issue rewards as per smart contract logic.
